titleStmt.title: A true relation of a second victorie over the Scots at Hamilton, commanded by Col. Kerr, who is taken by the Parliament's forces, with other prisoners of qualitie. Certified by an express from my Lord General. Hereunto is annexed the remonstrance of the western-Scottish forces to the King, and Committee of Estates, Octob. 25. 1650. And in answer thereunto the declaration of the King, and Committee of Estates against the said remonstrance, Nov. 25. 1650. With other censures thereupon.
titleStmt.author: Cromwell, Oliver, 1599-1658.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by W.D. by the appointment of the Council of State,

notesStmt.note: Reproductions of the originals in the British Library.

person.persName: the appointment of the Council of State
